description: Attacker renames vssadmin.exe to a benign name like 'updater.exe' to bypass process name-based detections.
evasion_technique: The rule detects on 'process.name' being 'vssadmin.exe', 'wmic.exe', or 'bcdedit.exe'. By renaming the binary, the 'Image' field no longer matches the rule's selection criteria.
